column2: The Warriors of the Rising Sun

There is glory in fighting, but one must both live and fight with honor for that glory to matter. Every Warrior of the Rising Sun knows this truth, and is prepared to fight those who are dishonorable, whether in a duel or on the battlefield.
This character possesses unmatched honor, and is said to be a fearsome warrior and a gifted strategist.
Wage war to prove to every Warrior of the Rising Sun that you are more honorable than [From.GetBestName].
We have sufficient Honor compared to their Honor
Call the Warriors of the Rising Sun into a war to subjugate an entire kingdom
the Sword of the Shifting Sands
[This.GetTitledFirstName] successfully proved that [This.GetSheHe] was not only the best Warrior of the Rising Sun, but also a true champion.

[Root.GetBestName],\I welcome you into the ranks of the Warriors of the Rising Sun and hope that you will prove your honor, your bravery, and your martial prowess over the years to come. Keep your sword at your side at all times, respect and honor your superiors, and hone your skills, and you may go far.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
While you doubtlessly had some combat training before joining the ranks of the Warriors of the Rising Sun, we have found that the standards for training found elsewhere often are lacking. To progress further in our ranks, you must find a mentor and prove yourself to them.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of a member of the Warriors of the Rising Sun that isn't a Novice and choose §YAsk to be my Mentor§! and then get their approval.
Ask [Root.GetBestName] to mentor you and vouch for your skill as a member of the Warriors of the Rising Sun

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
While you have proven that you are a true warrior there are those in the ranks of the Warriors of the Rising Sun that have yet to do so. To give them the opportunity to prove themselves, you should mentor one of them.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of a Novice that lacks a mentor and has yet to prove themselves and choose §YAsk to be my Student§! and then get their approval.
Offer [Root.GetBestName] the opportunity to become your student so that [Root.GetSheHe] may prove [Root.GetHerselfHimself] as a true Warrior of the Rising Sun.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
You are a skilled warrior, but so is [duel_target.GetBestName], and it would benefit all Warriors of the Rising Sun if the question as to which one of you are the better warrior is laid to rest. I suggest you challenge [duel_target.GetHerHim] to a duel.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of your target and choose to §YDuel§! them. The winner will receive the most §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
With the death of [From.GetBestName] it is no longer possible for me to complete my mission to duel [From.GetHerHim].
With the death of [From.GetBestName] it is no longer possible for me to complete my mission to win a War of Honor against [From.GetHerHim].

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
It is no secret that you and [duel_target.GetBestName] are bitter rivals. No matter who is in the right, honor dictates that you should challenge [duel_target.GetHerHim] to a duel to the death to settle the matter once and for all.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
You have been tasked with challenging your rival to a duel to the death. To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of your target and choose to §YDuel§! them.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
A true warrior is as skilled at commanding others as they are fighting a duel, and there is no better way for you to prove that you are indeed a skilled commander than to win a War of Honor against [war_target.GetBestName].

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
To complete this mission you must fight a War of Honor against [war_target.GetBestName] as either the attacker or the defender and win. White peace or surrender equals failure.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
It is well known that you and [war_target.GetBestName] are rivals and that you consider each other to be dishonorable. Prove that you are the honorable party by defeating [war_target.GetHerHim] in a War of Honor.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
To complete this mission you must fight a War of Honor against [war_target.GetBestName] as either the attacker or the defender and win. White peace or surrender equals failure.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
While engaging in glorious battle on the battlefield certainly is honorable there are times when a warrior needs to look to the defense of their lands and people. To ensure that you are prepared for this eventuality, you should construct a castle.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
To complete this mission for the Warriors of the Rising Sun you must construct a new castle holding somewhere in your realm.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
It is disappointing that your current focus in life is somewhat less honorable. To remedy this problem, I suggest that you immediately switch to the War Focus.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
To complete this quest you must switch to the War Focus.

In accordance with the desires of the Warriors of the Rising Sun you have decided to dedicate yourself to warfare for the time being by switching to the War Focus. Hopefully, this will result in some benefits other than just the respect of your peers, even if that respect certainly isn't something to scoff at.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
You are a great warrior, and may be one of the best in the Warriors of the Rising Sun, but there are skilled warriors elsewhere in the world that might be better. If you wish to prove yourself the very best, you must seek them out and defeat them.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

The Warriors of the Rising Sun have determined where some of the best warriors in the world may be found and will instruct you to seek them out and defeat them. Travel where they dictate, locate your opponents, and defeat them all.

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
It pleases me that you have defeated your foe in a War of Honor in accordance with the desires of the Warriors of the Rising Sun. It certainly proves that you are an honorable warrior, while they are somewhat lacking.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
It pleases me that you have defeated your hated rival in a War of Honor in accordance with the desires of the Warriors of the Rising Sun. Clearly, you are in the right and they are as dishonorable as you say.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
As if there was any doubt!

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
It displeases me and all other Warriors of the Rising Sun that you have failed to defeat your foe in a War of Honor. Perhaps you are not as skilled a warrior as we had been led to believe, and perhaps your honor is also lacking...

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
It displeases me and all other Warriors of the Rising Sun that you have failed to defeat your hated rival in a War of Honor. It would seem that you are not as skilled a warrior as you have claimed, and we have to wonder whether they are indeed as dishonorable as you previously have claimed...

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
This did not go as planned..

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I hereby request that you gather your warriors and come to my aid, in the name of the Warriors of the Rising Sun. Not doing so would definitely be a sign that you are not a [Root.GetWomanMan] of honor.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
I will do as you ask!

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I accept your call to arms as a fellow member of the Warriors of the Rising Sun. We shall fight side by side and prevail in this honorable struggle.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I have no intention to support you in your current wars, as I see no honor in doing so. Fight your own battles, and prevail if you can.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I write to you to request that you agree to serve as my mentor in the ways of the Warriors of the Rising Sun so that I may prove myself worthy and may ascend to a higher rank.

By my hand and seal,
[FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName]
Prove that you are worthy of my time!
You will have to pay me!
I will do it... for a Favor!

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I am honored that you have seen fit to approach me and it would be a pleasure to mentor you in the ways of the Warriors of the Rising Sun.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I might be prepared to mentor you in the ways of the Warriors of the Rising Sun as you ask, but before I can tell if I am prepared to do that you will have to show me how well you fight.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I am a busy [From.GetWomanMan] and am uncertain as to whether I would be able to find the time to mentor you. A small amount of gold would make it easier for me to find the time...

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I can see why you would want me to mentor you in the ways of the Warriors of the Rising Sun, and I might be willing to do you that favor, but in that case I would ask a favor in return...

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
You may have been allowed to join the ranks of the Warriors of the Rising Sun, but that does not entitle you to my guidance. Find another mentor, for I dont see any reason to mentor you.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[From.GetBestName] arrives without delay and eagerly shows what [From.GetSheHe] is capable of as a warrior. In your experience, new members of the Warriors of the Rising Sun are generally somewhat lacking in skill regardless of their background, but [From.GetBestName] is truly skilled, and it is even possible that [From.GetSheHe] would end up teaching you more than you could teach [From.GetHerHim].
I will suggest a better mentor!
I will mentor them, even so!

[From.GetBestName] arrives without delay and eagerly shows what [From.GetSheHe] is capable of as a warrior. While you notice some areas where [From.GetSheHe] might be lacking, these flaws are rather minor, and you must admit that those that taught [From.GetBestName] to fight did a very good job that you cannot improve upon very much.
I will mentor them, even so!

[From.GetBestName] arrives without delay and eagerly shows what [From.GetSheHe] is capable of as a warrior. You notice some flaws, but also some strengths, and in your opinion [From.GetBestName] is about as skilled as the average new member of the Warriors of the Rising Sun is expected to be. You could certainly help [From.GetHerHim] improve a little, and it would likely not be too difficult.

[From.GetBestName] arrives without delay and eagerly shows what [From.GetSheHe] is capable of as a warrior. You notice a few promising areas, but on the whole [From.GetSheHe] is a rather poor warrior, and it would likely take quite some work to help [From.GetHerHim] improve to the point where they would perform adequately.

[From.GetBestName] arrives without delay and eagerly shows what [From.GetSheHe] is capable of as a warrior. To call [From.GetHerHis] performance "bad" would be charitable, to say the least, and it would doubtlessly be a major undertaking to make [From.GetHerHim] perform at even the lowest level you would deem acceptable for a WArrior of the Rising Sun.

Despite giving [From.GetBestName] a fair opportunity to prove [From.GetHerselfHimself] worthy of being your student, which is well within your rights, [From.GetSheHe] does not agree to the idea, seemingly operating under the impression that all [From.GetSheHe] has to do is ask.
In that case, I must refuse!

It seems you have impressed [From.GetBestName] with your skills to a greater extent than you would have thought possible as [From.GetSheHe] informs you that [From.GetSheHe] is uncertain whether [From.GetSheHe] could teach you much, suggesting that [better_mentor.GetBestName] might be a better mentor. [From.GetBestName] has offered to ask [better_mentor.GetHerHim] for you.

Though you would have expected [From.GetBestName] to accept your offer to try to get [better_mentor.GetBestName] to teach [From.GetHerHim] instead as that likely would be more beneficial [From.GetBestName] surprises you by demanding that you mentor [From.GetHerHim] personally since [From.GetSheHe] saw fit to ask you rather than [better_mentor.GetBestName].

While your request seems to have taken [From.GetBestName] by surprise it evidently was a good idea to ask as [From.GetSheHe] has agreed to take you on despite [From.GetHerHis] initial reservations. Perhaps you will not learn as much as you might be able to learn with another mentor, but you might also prove yourself worthy of being a Warrior of the Rising Sun much sooner.

It seems you displeased [From.GetBestName] by insisting that [From.GetSheHe] should mentor you personally as [From.GetSheHe] has refused to entertain the notion and has rescinded [From.GetHerHis] previous offer to help you get another mentor. You will have to ask someone else in person, it would seem.

A messenger has arrived from [FromFrom.GetBestName], telling you that [From.GetBestName] approached [FromFrom.GetBestName] in the hopes of being mentored and that [From.GetBestName] was skilled enough that [FromFrom.GetBestName] thinks that [FromFrom.GetHerHis] skills would be insufficient. [FromFrom.GetBestName] suggests that you would make for a better mentor for [From.GetBestName].
I would be happy to teach them!

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I hereby inform you that I have seen fit to accept you as my student, as requested by [FromFromFrom.GetBestName]. I hope that this will be a mutually beneficial arrangement.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I hereby inform you that [FromFrom.GetBestName] has accepted me as [FromFrom.GetHerHis] student. I thank you for your help in arranging this.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
While [FromFromFrom.GetBestName] speaks highly of you I do not think it would be in my interests to mentor you as [FromFromFrom.GetSheHe] has requested.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
Despite your letter to [FromFrom.GetHerHim] [FromFrom.GetBestName] has refused to mentor me. I ask that you mentor me instead, as I initially requested.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
If [FromFromFrom.GetBestName] is unwilling to mentor you then I am prepared to do so, in accordance with what you initially suggested.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I am surprised that [FromFromFrom.GetBestName] is unwilling to mentor you, but though it certainly is not ideal for you I am still not prepared to mentor you personally.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
You have performed quite well, and I would definitely be willing to mentor you so that you may learn what little you have to learn before you have proven yourself.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
Your performance was not particularly impressive, but I am still willing to mentor you so that you may become truly worthy of being a Warrior of the Rising Sun.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
While your performance was decent enough I must say that I would rather not mentor you. Go find someone else that would be willing to do that.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
Your performance was not particularly impressive, and I therefore have no interest in mentoring you. I wish you better luck elsewhere.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
While I am surprised to learn that you would go as far as to demand money in exchange for mentoring me I still think that that is an acceptable bargain.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I think it is quite dishonest of you to demand money in exchange for mentoring me, and I have no interest in any such arrangement. I will look elsewhere for a mentor.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
While I am surprised to learn that you would go as far as to demand a Favor in exchange for mentoring me I still think that that is an acceptable bargain.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I think it is quite dishonest of you to demand a Favor in exchange for mentoring me, and I have no interest in any such arrangement. I will look elsewhere for a mentor.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I am quite happy to inform you that we now share a mentor in [FromFrom.GetBestName] and look forward to spending more time together.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
[FromFrom.GetBestName] has seen fit to mentor me as I seek to prove myself a worthy Warrior of the Rising Sun. I hope we can be friends, or at least not rivals.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetBestName],
[From.GetBestName] will be mentoring me from now on, and I look forward to proving that I am your superior in every way and that you are unfit to be a Warrior of the Rising Sun.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetBestName]
Let's see what the future holds...
You are a fool to oppose me!

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I am quite happy to hear that we now share a mentor in [FromFrom.GetBestName] and look forward to spending more time together.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I have been told that [FromFrom.GetBestName] has seen fit to mentor you as well. I hope we can be friends, or at least not rivals.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetBestName],
I hear [From.GetBestName] will be mentoring you from now on, and I look forward to proving that I am your superior in every way and that you are unfit to be a Warrior of the Rising Sun.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetBestName]
Let's see what the future holds...
You are a fool to oppose me!

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
It has come to my attention that you do not have a mentor, and without a mentor it will be impossible for you to prove yourself worthy of being a Warrior of the Rising Sun. I would be happy to mentor you, if that is acceptable.

By my hand and seal,
[FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
Your offer to mentor me is most definitely welcome, and I see no reason not to accept. I hope that this will be mutually beneficial.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

[Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
Your offer to mentor me is kind, but I think that another mentor would be more beneficial for me, so I must refuse your offer.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

As part of your mentoring duties you are expected to help [From.GetBestName] improve [From.GetHerHis] skills when it comes to a variety of weapons. One of those weapons is the sword, which many would consider the most important weapon in the arsenal of any warrior. Perhaps it is time to give [From.GetBestName] a swordfighting lesson?
The sword is an elegant weapon...
I have better things to do!

Your mentor, [From.GetBestName], has seen fit to plan a swordfighting lesson for you, stating that it is something that [From.GetSheHe] thinks is a mandatory part of the training that every Warrior of the Rising Sun must undergo.\n\n"The sword is an elegant weapon...," [From.GetSheHe] tells you.
I don't have time for this!

While other, less civilized, cultures might think that the bow is a weapon that is only fit for hunting for for the peasantry, you know better, and you also know that the rest of the Warriors of the Rising Sun think likewise. It would probably not be amiss to spend some time working on marksmanship as part of your mentoring of [From.GetBestName].
I should give [From.GetHerHim] a few tips!

Your mentor, [From.GetBestName], has announced that [From.GetSheHe] think it would be wise for the two of you to dedicate some time towards working on your skills with a bow, stating that it is good for every warrior to be a skilled archer. Of course, while you know that the Warriors of the Rising Sun tend to use bows from time to time you have also heard that others look down on archers.

Though the sword obviously is the weapon that a true Warrior of the Rising Sun should prefer in melee combat there are situations where a spear is more useful, and it would probably be amiss not to give [From.GetBestName] a lesson in how to handle that weapon in case [From.GetSheHe] should need it.
I can give a few tips...

Though you have been told that the sword is the best weapon for melee combat, your mentor, [From.GetBestName], has also suggested that there are situations where it might be a good idea to use something else, and now [From.GetSheHe] is suggesting that the two of you should spend some time practicing with a spear in case you ever need to use one.

Though it would not be amiss to spend some time giving [From.GetBestName] a lesson in how to fight on horseback, it would probably also be a good idea to spend some time just working on basic horsemanship as there are those that end up neglecting that to their detriment because they focus too much on mounted combat.

Your mentor, [From.GetBestName], surprises you one day by announcing that [From.GetSheHe] thinks that the two of you should spend the day riding and that the day's activities should not involve weapon practice. Perhaps there is wisdom in that suggestion, as knowing how to handle a horse without a weapon at the ready could be important, but perhaps not.

While you have heard it said that there are less civilized cultures that look down on a [Root.GetWomanMan] using a bow from horseback on the battlefield instead of fighting with a close range weapon during mounted combat, you know that the Warriors of the Rising Sun do not share that belief. Perhaps it is time to instruct [From.GetBestName] in mounted archery?
I don't want to do this...

[From.GetBestName] informs you that [From.GetSheHe] intends for your next lesson to be on the matter of mounted archery, stating that it is a perfectly valid approach to combat despite what some foreign barbarians might think. You are of course familiar with using a bow from horseback already, but perhaps it would not be amiss to go along with the plan even so?

The sword is a useful weapon, and is generally what one would expect a warrior to use when fighting a duel on foot or in many other combat circumstances. However, it is also a weapon that can be used on horseback, and it might be a good idea to have a lesson on the subject as part of [From.GetBestName]'s training, seeing as it could be useful when fighting as a Warrior of the Rising Sun.

[From.GetBestName] has sent you instructions to ready your horse and bring your sword as well, stating that your next lesson should be on the subject of mounted swordsmanship. Even though you know that the general sentiment among the Warriors of the Rising Sun is that fighting on foot with your sword is the most honorable approach to combat, this lesson might still be useful.

Using a spear on horseback is a bit different from using one on foot. As part of the mentoring of [From.GetBestName], it might be valuable to spend some time working on the mounted approach, as there are sadly warriors who neglect it in favor of either fighting with a spear on foot or using another weapon on horseback even when those fighting styles are inferior.
It would be a waste of time...

One day your mentor, [From.GetBestName], informs you that [From.GetSheHe] intends to give you a lesson in how to use a spear in mounted combat. While you already have some idea of how that works, it would perhaps not be amiss to spend some time working on it even so as [From.GetBestName] perhaps has a few useful tips you haven't heard before.
Fetch me a horse and a spear!

Though a Warrior of the Rising Sun is expected to keep a sword within reach at nearly all times and usually also will be keeping other weapons on hand there might be circumstances where a warrior is separated from all of their weapons. Though this is a shameful situation, knowing how to fight without weapons might still be good, and training [From.GetBestName] in unarmed combat might be wise.

To your surprise, [From.GetBestName] tells you to put your weapons aside one day when your lessons are about to begin, stating that it would be a good idea for you to learn how to fight if you end up being separated from your weapons for one reason or another. While it woudl be shameful to be caught in such a situation, it would probably be less shameful if you knew what to do...

A Warrior of the Rising Sun is supposed to be honorable at all times, and there are few things as honorable as ensuring that the law is followed at all times. This is probably not unknown to [From.GetBestName], but as [From.GetHerHis] mentor it might be good for you to ensure that [From.GetSheHe] is aware of this being the case.
I don't have time for this...

Your mentor, [From.GetBestName], sets some time aside one day to discuss your opinions on the subject of laws and justice. [From.GetSheHeCap] is quite pleased when [From.GetSheHe] hears that the two of you are in agreement on the subject, stating that there are other Warriors of the Rising Sun that have other, incorrect, opinions on the matter.

Your mentor, [From.GetBestName], sets some time aside one day to discuss your opinions on the subject of laws and justice. You know that all Warriors of the Rising Sun are supposed to be honorable, and that there are those that think that being honorable and following the law is the same thing, but until now you haven't really considered your position on the matter.
Laws sometimes have to be broken...

While the Warriors of the Rising Sun are open to having members that aren't [Root.Religion.GetName] and on rare occasions have permitted members that have quite exotic religions, it is rather doubtful that foreign ways are fully compatible with being an honorable warrior. Perhaps it would be wise to instruct [From.GetBestName] about the dangers of foreign ways?
Their foreign ways must be avoided!

Your mentor, [From.GetBestName], seems to be concerned by the fact that foreign barbarians might have religions that are inherently incompatible with being honorable, as [From.GetSheHe] spends a large part of a day talking about the matter and how it is important for all Warriors of the Rising Sun to be on their guard against those following such religions.
Their foreign ways must be avoided!

Your religion has sometimes been something of a sore point when it comes to your interactions with other Warriors of the Rising Sun, as there are those that think that your faith is too foreign to be something that an honorable warrior could follow. As part of mentoring [From.GetBestName], it might be possible to evoke sympathy, so that you might have one less enemy in the future.
This would be a waste of time...

It is well known that your mentor, [From.GetBestName], follows a religion that is quite unusual for a Warrior of the Rising Sun, and there are those that think that this makes [From.GetHerHim] inherently dishonorable. Your mentor has been telling you that the [From.Religion.GetName] religion is not as dishonorable as people might think, and seems to have arguments to back this up.
Well, they seem alright to me...

Your student, [From.GetBestName], is not a follower of one of the main religions of the Warriors of the Rising Sun, and though there are those that think that foreign religions always are dishonorable you have to admit that [From.GetBestName] is honorable. Perhaps there is some merit to not dismissing an entire religion out of hand, as that might cloud your judgement on other issues as well?
I should keep an open mind...

You are surprised to learn that your mentor, [From.GetBestName], is not as prejudiced towards the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith as many other Warriors of the Rising Sun have been in the past. [From.GetSheHeCap] has even gone as far as saying that your honor proves that it would be foolish to dismiss an entire religion as being inherently dishonorable.
